post: I think me, Ron, AnnieC, Max and some others deserve credit (not all the credit but at least some) for this increase because our interesting exchanges seem to attract many people.  AND I PERSONALLY KNOW THAT, AMONG THEM, THERE’S A LOT OF PEOPLE DIRECTLY INVOLVED IN SHROUD RESEARCH AND MANY OF THEM ARE MEMBERS OF THE SHROUD SCIENCE GROUP !!!  So, when I heard people saying that blogs are just a lot of bullsh** written by a bunch of fools, I disagree ! ;-)
author: Yannick Clément

title: Growth of this Shroud of Turin Blog
post:
Yannick is right. But there are other factors as well. The Real Face of Jesus drove searches that brought people to the blog. Facebook, inexplicably, became a major source of inbound links starting in early 2011. In early 2011 I had a hip replacement and was mostly housebound for several weeks and I decided to blog with the time I had on my hands.
The trend is strong and there is no evidence of a downturn of three months of more. Here is hoping . . .
Dan
